name: custodian
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
formal a person with responsibility for protecting or taking care of something or keeping something in good condition: the custodian of a museum/castle
formal someone who tries to protect particular ideas or principles: She sees herself as a custodian of the public's morals.
US (UK caretaker) a person employed to take care of a large building, such as a school, and who deals with the cleaning, repairs, etc.
